tokens.text: defines a node in a bezier chain curve

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Particles Particle Curve Bezier Chain Node Proxy

description: Defines a control point in a bezier chain curve, specifying position and slope at that point. Multiple nodes chain together to create smooth curves for animating particle properties over time. Each node's slope controls how smoothly values transition to neighboring nodes, enabling organic motion like bobbing, pulsing, or easing effects.
